name: Joushou Mahjong Tenpai
overview: Joushou Mahjong Tenpai ("Heavenly Tiles of Invincible Mahjong", roughly) is a mahjong game for the Super Famicom with the developer/publisher team of Game Arts and Enix, both companies better known for their RPG series. Joushou Mahjong Tenpai would be the only Super Famicom/SNES game Game Arts created. As well as allowing the player to take on the CPU for various mahjong sessions, the game has a plethora of advanced tactics and advice for would-be mahjong masters.
